game.title: Save the Kingdom
game.objective: Defeat the evil sorcerer and save the kingdom from destruction.
game.description: The kingdom is under threat from a powerful sorcerer who has unleashed dark forces upon the land. As a brave adventurer, it is your mission to defeat the sorcerer and save the kingdom from destruction. Embark on a dangerous journey filled with battles, puzzles, and magical artifacts.
game.reward: Ancient artifact that grants the bearer unlimited power.

task.description: Legend speaks of a powerful sword hidden deep within the Enchanted Forest. Journey to the forest and search for the sword.
The sorcerer has stolen a magical amulet that holds the key to his powers. Infiltrate his fortress and retrieve the amulet.

task.objective: Defeat the sorcerer in a magical duel
task.description: Face the sorcerer in a battle of magical powers. Only by defeating him can you save the kingdom.
